name: StarWind (Celxius)
description:
Destroy enemies spaceships as you pilot through the skies in StarWind!

This game is a prototype,  built from a school project a few years ago. There are five levels complete, and you advance to the next level by beating the specified number of baddies.

Controls

  • WASD - Move
  • Left Mouse Click - Fire
  • Right Mouse Click - Activate Special (with full energy)
  • Press 'R' when dead to restart the level

UI

Ships

There are currently two ships available, the SHIVA and the ODIN. The hope was to add more. 

  • SHIVA - Basic ship, mostly all rounded with a slight edge to attacking. The Special ability will set your ship's cannon to rapid fire mode.
  • ODIN - A defensive wall. The Special ability will dramatically increase your shield regeneration.

PowerUps

There are three powerups to help you get through the game. They have a chance to spawn in place of an enemy.

  •   - Restores health
  •   - Restores shield
  •   - Restores energy

This game is incredibly broken and not very balanced, but was fun to make in the short amount of time I had to make it. I also am not 100% sure if it's beatable with the ODIN ship, but you're more than welcome to try! As always, feedback is greatly appreciated. 

Credits

Audio/Music

Main Menu Theme - Hero Immortal by Trevor Lentz
Chararacter Select Theme - Title Screen by Juhani Junkala
Level 1 BGM - Level 3 by Juhani Junkala
Level 2 BGM - Level 1 by Juhani Junkala
Level 3 BGM - Rainging Bits
Level 4 BGM - Mars by SketchyLogic
Level 5 BGM - Level 2 by Juhani Junkala

Background/Enemy/Player Assets

I can't find the file I had that kept track of where those assets came from. If anyone knows, please reach out so I can properly attribute.

Thank you so much for playing my game!
